mapper.update:
update zzjg_department_tbl
ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
utime = #{utime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del = #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update zzjg_department_tbl set ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, utime = #{utime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del = #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.name, t1.level, (select name from zzjg_company_tbl where id = t1.cid) companyName, (select name from zzjg_department_tbl where id = t1.pid) parName from zzjg_department_tbl t1 where t1.del = 0 and t1.uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by t1.id desc

select t1.id, t1.name, t1.level, (select name from zzjg_company_tbl where id = t1.cid) companyName from zzjg_department_tbl t1 where t1.del = 0 and t1.level = 1 and t1.uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by t1.id desc

select t1.id, t1.name, t1.level, (select name from zzjg_company_tbl where id = t1.cid) companyName, t2.name parName from zzjg_department_tbl t1 left join zzjg_department_tbl t2 on t1.pid = t2.id where t1.del = 0 and t2.del = 0 and t1.uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t1.level = 2 group by parName, name order by t2.id asc, t1.id asc
select T2.name pname, T1.name name, T1.id from zzjg_department_tbl T1 left join zzjg_department_tbl T2 on T1.pid = T2.id where T1.cid = #{cid} and T1.del = 0

select t1.id, t1.name, t2.name parName from zzjg_department_tbl t1 left join zzjg_department_tbl t2 on t1.pid = t2.id where t1.del = 0 and t2.del = 0 and t1.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t1.level = 2 group by parName, name order by t1.id asc
select * from zzjg_department_tbl where cid= #{companyId, jdbcType=INTEGER } and level = 1
select * from zzjg_department_tbl where uid= #{0} and pid = #{1} and level = 2 and del = 0
select name from zzjg_department_tbl where uid= #{id} and level=1;
